awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Monotone Numerical Methods for 2-D   and 3-D Convection- Diffusion Equations
awd_abstract_narration: This research program is concerned with the analysis,                   development and testing of finite difference methods for                        convection-diffusion problems in two and three dimensions                       based on the theory of monotone matrices.  The algorithms                       developed will provide high accuracy, oscillation free,                         approximate solutions to these difficult problems in partial                    differential equations.                                                                 The results of the research program will have direct                    applications in fluid flow, combustion and related problems.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: UNIVERSITY OF PITTSBURGH - OF THE COMMONWEALTH SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION
